ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
proj:
- '9.5'
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
skyproj provides an astronomically oriented interface to
ploting sky maps based on matplotlib and PROJ. skyproj is
intended as the primary visualization tool for healsparse
maps, which provide high resolution maps in a memory efficent way.
skyproj can create interactive visualizations of healsparse and
healpy maps that dynamically change resolution.
about.summary: Sky mapping with matplotlib and PROJ

about.description:
skyproj provides an astronomically oriented interface to
ploting sky maps based on matplotlib and PROJ. skyproj is
intended as the primary visualization tool for healsparse
maps, which provide high resolution maps in a memory efficent way.
skyproj can create interactive visualizations of healsparse and
healpy maps that dynamically change resolution.
about.summary: Sky mapping with matplotlib and PROJ

name: skyproj
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "skyproj" %}
{% set version = "2.1.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "8f1edd0457d13a87f5b88a16e105a92e953845b3e4a85607716901ab0dc8cb93" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools_scm
    - setuptools_scm_git_archive
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy
    - astropy-base >=4.0
    - matplotlib-base >=3.8
    - healsparse
    - hpgeom
    - pyproj >=3.1

test:
  imports:
    - skyproj
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/lsstdesc/skyproj
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Sky mapping with matplotlib and PROJ
  description: |
    skyproj provides an astronomically oriented interface to
    ploting sky maps based on matplotlib and PROJ. skyproj is
    intended as the primary visualization tool for healsparse
    maps, which provide high resolution maps in a memory efficent way.
    skyproj can create interactive visualizations of healsparse and
    healpy maps that dynamically change resolution.
  dev_url: https://github.com/lsstdesc/skyproj

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - erykoff
